data.question: What is the highest C2H2 uptake capacity achieved by UPC-200 systems?
Which UPC-200 material demonstrated the highest separation efficiency for C2H2/CO2?
What is the role of fluorine-functionalized organic linkers in UPC-200 systems?
data.answer: To enhance the C2H2 interaction through strong C–H···F hydrogen bonding and van der Waals interactions

data.question: True or False: UPC-200(Fe)-F-H2O has a BET surface area of 3192.1 m2 g−1.
What is the IAST C2H2/CO2 selectivity of UPC-200(Fe)-F-H2O at 110 kPa?
How does the modification of terminal ligands affect the pore size in UPC-200 systems?
data.answer: The modification with imidazole, 4-methylimidazole, or benzimidazole narrows down the cavity sizes, affecting the pore size and window size of the cages

data.question: True or False: UPC-200(Fe)-F-BIM has a higher C2H2 adsorption capacity at 273 K compared to UPC-200(Fe)-F-H2O.
What is the effect of metal substitution on the stability of UPC-200 systems?
data.answer: Different metals affect the chemical stability of MOFs without significantly altering the pore sizes and environments, with UPC-200(Al)-F-H2O showing the highest thermal stability

data.question: True or False: UPC-200(Al)-F-H2O can maintain its crystalline structure at pH = 0–12.
What is the role of benzimidazole terminal ligands in UPC-200 systems?
data.answer: To optimize the pore size for improved gas separation performance

data.question: True or False: UPC-200 systems have been explored for selective adsorption of C2H2/CO2, C2H2/C2H4/C2H6, and C3H6/C3H8.
What is the main challenge in C2H2/CO2 separation mentioned in the text?
data.answer: C2H2 and CO2 have similar geometrical dimensions and boiling points, making their separation challenging

data.question: True or False: The practical applications of MOFs for gas separation usually suffer from either relatively low C2H2 uptake or poor C2H2/CO2 selectivity.
What is the main goal in developing new strategies for MOF design as mentioned in the text?
data.answer: To design MOFs with both high C2H2 uptake capacity and excellent C2H2/CO2 selectivity

data.question: True or False: The complexity of the pore environment of MOFs can be enriched by introducing multiple ligands bearing different functional groups.
What is the significance of MTV-MOFs in the context of the text?
data.answer: MTV-MOFs, with their structural diversity and pore-surface heterogeneity, may lead to synergistic effects for enhanced gas separation performance

data.question: True or False: UPC-200 series demonstrated remarkable C2H2 uptake and selectivity due to the tunable pore environment.
What is the main advantage of UPC-200(Fe)-F-BIM over nonfunctionalized UPC-200(Fe)-H-H2O?
data.answer: UPC-200(Fe)-F-BIM increased the C2H2 adsorption capacity and C2H2/CO2 uptake ratio by 32.4% and 23.8%, respectively, compared to UPC-200(Fe)-H-H2O

data.question: True or False: The high stability of UPC-200(Al)-F-H2O is attributed to the small ionic radius of Al3+, which forms a strong bond with the carboxylate linker.
What is the main focus of the computational screening methods mentioned in the text?
data.answer: To quickly predict the C2H2/CO2 separation performance of MTV-UPC-200
